home.title: Your Path To Financial Clarity
home.subtitle: Gaining clear and organized financial understanding through evaluation, budgeting, and planning.

quantitative.title: Quantitative Analysis Indicators
quantitative.description: Used in financial analysis to evaluate investment performance, risk and return. These indicators are based on mathematical and statistical methods to help investors and analysts make objective investment decisions.

qualitative.title: Qualitative Analysis Indicators
qualitative.description: Subjective judgments that assess non-financial factors such as corporate management quality, brand value and market competitiveness for a comprehensive understanding of the business.

articles.title: Financial Market Dynamics and In-depth Analysis
articles.description: Better understanding of financial markets, higher investment judgment, start the investment upgrade path

finance_terms.title: Financial Terms
finance_terms.description: Provides basic concepts and vocabulary commonly used in finance to help understand market operations and investment decisions

error.password: Password must be at least 6 characters
